text: @MattHancock Interesting... so why am I still waiting for my result to come back after 16 days #coronavirus  ..this from a wikipaedia entry-..never admit a fault or wrong; never leave room for alternatives; never accept blame; concentrate on one enemy at a time; people believe a big lie #sad
